targets.query: select "name" as "container", alameda_scaler_namespace as namespace, alameda_scaler_name as "alameda scaler", pod_name as pod, node_name as node, "policy", is_alameda from alameda_cluster_status..container group by "alameda_scaler_namespace", "alameda_scaler_name", "pod_name", "name" order by time desc limit 1
select create_time *1000 , "name", node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, in_cluster from alameda_cluster_status..node

select sum from (select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now() -5d and time < now() group by time(3600s)), (select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now() and time <= now()+1d group by time(3600s)) where count = $count_pod)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d group by time(3600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d group by time(3600s)

select sum from (select sum(resource_request_cpu), count(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() and time <= now()+1d  group by time(3600s) fill(none) ) where count = $count_pod

select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() -5d and time < now() group by time(3600s) fill(none)

select sum from ( select sum(resource_request_cpu), count(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() -3600s and time <= now()+1d  group by time(3600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_pod

panels.title: CPU: Observation, and Prediction (in CPU milicore)

targets.query: select round(sum) from (select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  AND time >= now() - 5d and time < now() group by time(3600s)), (select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ AND time >= now() and time <= now()+1d group by time(3600s)) where count = $count_pod)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d  group by time(3600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d  group by time(3600s)

select round(sum) from ( select sum(resource_request_memory), count(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   and "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and  time >= now() and time <= now()+1d  group by time(3600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_pod

select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   and  time >= now() -5d and time < now() group by time(3600s) fill(none)

select sum from (select sum(resource_request_memory), count(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   and  time >= now() -3600s and time <= now()+1d  group by time(3600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_pod

select sum from (select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now() - 5w and time < now() group by time(21600s)), (select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now()  and time <= now()+1w group by time(21600s)) where count = $count_pod)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w group by time(21600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w group by time(21600s)

select sum from (select sum(resource_request_cpu), count(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '21600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() and time <= now() +1w  group by time(21600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_pod

select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '21600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() -5w and time < now()  group by time(21600s) fill(none)

select sum from (select sum(resource_request_cpu), count(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '21600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() -21600s and time <= now()+1w  group by time(21600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_pod

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_namespace" where 'Cluster' != '$resource'
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_namespace" where 'Cluster' != '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'
list.label: Application
list.name: scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="pod_name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: Pod
list.name: pod
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="pod_name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: select alameda_scaler_namespace, enable_VPA from (select alameda_scaler_namespace, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by alameda_scaler_namespace),(select alameda_scaler_namespace, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where 'Cluster' != '$resource' and alameda_scaler_namespace = '$ns' group by alameda_scaler_namespace)
list.name: h_ns
list.query: select alameda_scaler_namespace, enable_VPA from (select alameda_scaler_namespace, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by alameda_scaler_namespace),(select alameda_scaler_namespace, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where 'Cluster' != '$resource' and alameda_scaler_namespace = '$ns' group by alameda_scaler_namespace)

list.definition: select alameda_scaler_name, enable_VPA from ( select alameda_scaler_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = '$resource') group by alameda_scaler_name), ( select alameda_scaler_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace" ='$ns' and 'Cluster' != '$resource' and 'Namespace' != '$resource' group by alameda_scaler_name)
list.name: h_scaler
list.query: select alameda_scaler_name, enable_VPA from ( select alameda_scaler_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = '$resource') group by alameda_scaler_name), ( select alameda_scaler_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace" ='$ns' and 'Cluster' != '$resource' and 'Namespace' != '$resource' group by alameda_scaler_name)

list.definition: select pod_name, enable_VPA from (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.label: h_pod
list.name: h_pod
list.query: select pod_name, enable_VPA from (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select "name", enable_VPA from (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" ='$h_pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.label: h_container
list.name: h_container
list.query: select "name", enable_VPA from (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" ='$h_pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select count(pod_name) from (select pod_name, enable_VPA from (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'))
list.label: Count
list.name: count_pod
list.query: select count(pod_name) from (select pod_name, enable_VPA from (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'))
